lead_paragraph: Charges in Britain link Ryan Cleary, 19, to the group that has attacked the Web sites of the U.S. Senate, the Central Intelligence Agency, PBS and Sony.

headline.seo: Arrest Puts Spotlight on Brazen Hacking Group LulzSec
headline.main: Arrest Puts Spotlight on Brazen Hacking Group LulzSec
headline.print_headline: British Police Charge Teenager in Connection With Hacking Attacks

snippet: Charges in Britain link Ryan Cleary, 19, to the group that has attacked the Web sites of the U.S. Senate, the Central Intelligence Agency, PBS and Sony.

byline.contributor: Riva Richmond contributed from New York.
byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and STEVE LOHR
